hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Abbas:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade a townsman to sell for a man from the desert. I asked: What do you mean by the selling of a townsman for a man from the desert ? He replied: He should not be a broker for him

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي النَّهْىِ أَنْ يَبِيعَ حَاضِرٌ لِبَادٍ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Prohibition Of A Town-Dweller Selling On Behalf Of A Bedouin
